dcterms:description: The Multi-PIE dataset contains images acquired under controlled lighting conditions with variations in pose, illumination, and expression, allowing for the study of face recognition performance across different lighting scenarios.
dcterms:title: Multi-PIE Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hu Han
Shiguang Shan
Xilin Chen
Wen Gao
dcterms:description: The PIE dataset is designed to study the effects of illumination on face recognition, featuring images captured under various lighting conditions and poses.
dcterms:title: Pose, Illumination and Expression (PIE) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Gary B. Huang
Manu Ramesh
Tamara Berg
Erik Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: The Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW) dataset is a collection of face images designed for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments, featuring a wide variety of subjects and conditions.
dcterms:title: Labeled Faces in the Wild (LFW) Dataset

dcterms:description: The IARPA Janus Benchmark-B Face Dataset is a large-scale dataset for face recognition research, featuring a diverse set of images collected from various sources.
dcterms:title: IARPA Janus Benchmark-B Face Dataset

dcterms:creator: Yandong Guo
Lei Zhang
Yuxiao Hu

dcterms:description: The MS-Celeb-1M dataset is a large-scale dataset for face recognition, containing over a million images of celebrities and public figures.
dcterms:title: MS-Celeb-1M Dataset

dcterms:description: The WebFace260M dataset is a large-scale dataset for deep face recognition, containing millions of images collected from the web.

dcterms:creator: Yu-Hsuan Huang
Homer H Chen
dcterms:description: The Specs on Faces (SoF) dataset contains images specifically designed for studying face recognition under dim lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: Specs on Faces (SoF) Dataset

dcterms:creator: Karl Ricanek
Tamirat Tesafaye
dcterms:description: The MORPH dataset is a longitudinal image database of normal adult age progression, widely used in face aging studies and demographic accuracy variation research.
dcterms:title: MORPH Dataset
